column2:
Purrrr.... Mzzzznyan, prowrrrrlow. Brbrbrbr.

<FelixNet thanks you for your efforts in freeing it.>

<FelixNet looks content.>
Mrrrow pzbrbrb *Sidetrack*
Brrow *Sidetrack* `points paw`
Prrrow?
Sure!

Brrip! Meow. `licks paw`

<FelixNet hopes you meet again in the future.>
Text

The Episodes tab helps you keep track of where you are. It's good to check here when you start to play. 

You'll see the episodes you've finished here along with new ones that await.

So now you've finished Episode 1 and we're starting Episode 2.

Before we get started on new challenges, let’s go check out our progress.

Click on the Clubhouse and then on the Episodes tab.
Hi there! Glad you’re here  =^._.^=   Ready to do some more exploring?
Yes!
I want A!
B is better!
You chose A. Good choice.
You chose B. Good choice!
Would you like to choose A or B?
Here's a key. You might need this later.
This is an example of a looping hint message.
They get this text next.
This is the final hint.
Great! Launch the Dummy App.
Click the Dummy App icon on the desktop.
Hey there! Do you want to start the Template Quest?
Sure!
Congratulations. You finished the template quest.
Here's some text. Our lines are limited to about 30 characters in length.

You can have multiple separated lines in the same stringID - We're in the second string...

And we're still in the second one now.
But now, we're in the third stringid. The user can't tell.
